summary: This id only text for now but it help me solve a problem encoucounter then turned by HArkon in Vampire all become hostile to me.
descriptionHtml:
By looking in scripts of Harkon mind i found a problem that he didn\'t add vampire faction to player, the only solution i could show you is this:

type console 
 in console write setrace <NameofRace>vampire

Example: setrace HighElfRacevampire

That solve the problem to me hope it help you too.
author: Aloid
